definition: exquisitely fine and subtle and pleasing
details:
adjective
- exquisitely fine and subtle and pleasing
- easily broken or damaged or destroyed
= example: easily broken or damaged or destroyed
= synonyms: fragile, frail
- difficult to handle
= synonyms: ticklish, touchy
- developed with extreme delicacy and subtlety
= synonyms: finespun
- of an instrument or device
- marked by great skill especially in meticulous technique
= example: marked by great skill especially in meticulous technique
- easily hurt
= synonyms: soft
